mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Media.YouTubeChannel
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Shows a playlist of videos from a YouTube account on a web page
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Implemented as an XSLT function. Allows you to control the RSS source, the number of items to display, and other settings through its parameters. RSS feeds are not cached.
